entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 except minus 12 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 except minus 12 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 9:18 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9 except minus 3 near the Alberta border.
